about_the_game:
Wacky Volleyball is a funny volleyball game that celebrates the sport by reinterpreting it in a humorous way through a skillful caricature of the game's highlights, making you feel immediately immersed in a somewhat bizarre experience that will captivate you thanks to its irresistible mix of unique characters, different and colorful volleyball courts, and engaging physics!

In the world of Wacky Volleyball there is only one rule: take the field by taking advantage of the extravagant logic of the game to win! The fundamentals of volleyball (dribble, bump, spike, block and serve) will be the main tools of your arsenal, intuitively usable thanks to the simple game controls.

Have fun creating your character by choosing from a wide variety of colors, clothing, and accessories to customize it according to your tastes. By participating and winning Wacky Volleyball tournaments you will have the chance to unlock new characters and new accessories!

Becoming a true Wacky Volleyball master will be as easy as drinking a glass of water! Just take advantage of the training opportunity offered by the interactive tutorial to become familiar with the bizarre game physics and its unpredictable dynamics!

Beware of powerups and maluses! Hit the powerups with the ball to make the game even more unique and wacky but watch out for maluses because you could run into unpleasant surprises!

Play now and show what you're made of! Good luck!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan compatible graphic card
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Wacky Volleyball is a casual arcade game where you play volleyball in a wacky humorous way with highly customizable character choices. Defeat your opponent by making sure they can't catch the ball, be it by perfect aim or by the strength that each power up brings to the volleyball court.
